grid_system.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 p-6 md:p-8

containers.card: rounded-xl border border-white/5 bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-xl shadow-2xl
containers.panel: h-full flex flex-col rounded-lg bg-slate-800/20 border border-slate-700/30

status_indicators.live_pulse: relative inline-flex h-2 w-2 rounded-full bg-green-500 animate-pulse box-shadow-[0_0_8px_#22C55E]

glassmorphism.usage: Sticky headers, floating panels, modal overlays

images.description: Abstract dark glass facade, use as background with heavy overlay
Blue geometric spiral, use for 'AI Processing' states
images.usage: Decision log empty state or processing background

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-300+ on slate-900 bg. Use text-white for critical info.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings with ring-blue-500 ring-offset-2 ring-offset-slate-900

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'clsx' and 'tailwind-merge' for class handling if not present.
Implement the 'TimelineView' as a horizontal flex container with time slots.
The 'ActionLog' should auto-scroll to bottom when new events arrive.
Use the dark theme by default, do not build a light mode toggle.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page hero.
Ensure the dashboard feels 'dense' but not 'cluttered' - use borders to separate areas instead of massive margins.
